mapper.select: select branchName, floor, officeName from office a left outer join branch b on a.branchCode=b.branchCode where branchName=#{branchInput} and floor=#{floorInput} and officeName=#{officeNameInput}
select officeNum from office a left outer join branch b on a.branchCode=b.branchCode where branchName=#{branchInput} and floor=#{floorInput} and officeName=#{officeNameInput}

select a.officeNum, branchName, floor, officeName, comName from office a left outer join branch b on a.branchCode=b.branchCode left outer join companyInfo c on a.officeNum=c.officeNum where branchName=#{branchSelected} and floor=#{floorSelected} and officeName=#{officeSelected}
select floor from branch a left outer join office b on a.branchCode=b.branchCode where branchName=#{branchSelected} group by floor
select officeName from office a left outer join branch b on a.branchCode=b.branchCode where branchName=#{branchSelected} and floor=#{floorSelected} and occupancy=0
